description:
I am running my own mumble server because I do prefer to run free software on my own hardware and I do not like the way Teamspeak is managed.

Mumble is not as easy to setup as its competitor and lacks some features that are not important to me. But it offers a great sound quality on a low latency voice chat.
summary: Open source voice chat that works great

description: ALSO NEEDS TO BE MORE SECURE, I WOULD LIKE TO VERIFY THAT THE SERVER CERTIFICATE THAT OTHER SERVER MEMBERS AGREED TO IS THE SAME AS MINE I DON'T WANT A MITM ATTACK TO HIT ME AND ME NOT KNOW IT. ALSO I WANT TO SEE EXACTLY WHAT IS ENCRYPTED AND TO WHAT EXTENT! I DONT SETTLE FOR THE WEAK JUNK PEOPLE USE THAT ONLY PROTECTS FOR 1 MONTH OF MARKOV CHAIN DYNAMIC CRACKING AT 200PFLOPS+.
summary: NEEDS UPDATED TO 1.3.0 ASAP I CAN ONLY GET 1.2.19 IN REPO

description: Stability and privacy are miles ahead of the competition.
summary: Best option for those who value privacy

description:
higher quality and lower-latency than alternatives like Discord, Skype, etc.
Also it's self-hosted & encrypted, meaning much better privacy.
Mumble has always just worked without all the performance and privacy drawbacks of some proprietary alternatives.
summary: Simple VOIP app that just works

description:
Been using mumble in order to be able to avoid discord or crappy / unreliable webservices and keep the data I produce on my end. Imho, it does this perfectly. The only issue is, that I more often see Windows users having issues with their audio not picking up, which is really making adoption in my social circle a pain :D

Other than that, it doesn't have some nice to have features and sometimes the UX is a bit weird.

Either way, it's worth it. Especially if you come from the Teamspeak world.

Already looking forward to version 1.4.x ?️
ich halte gar nichts davon es ist furchtbar
seit des letzten update, schrecklich zu konfigurieren, mumbel nicht schlecht nur das einstellen stürtzt er ab
Just buy yourself a headset. Automatic speech detection is wonderful with it. Positional audio with minetest also blew my mind!
summary: Perfect as long as it's used with a headset

description:
- Easy installation as flatpak
- Latest version features RNNoise to massively reduce background noise
- You do no longer have to hear your friend's keyboards with RNNoise enabled 
- Very good voice quality
summary: Great! This version is even better!

description:
Very good voice chat, low latency, encrypted communication.
Better sound quality than oter systems. Server (murmur) runs on virtual servers with low capacaty.

Benutze das Programm jetzt seit einem Jahr, bin zufrieden.
Perfekt das man seinen eigenen Server aufsetzen kann.
I love this program, is very easy to host yourself a server.
